text: Indeed it does :thinking_face:  you could then just grab the URL and use that for a regular link, you probably lose some impression stats though, IIRC the clicks get tracked properly and attributed to the CTA though.

Or wait for CTA to get rendered and then set nofollow attribute :zany_face:
Crawlers/bots would probably grab that original markup that we mangled and not the rendered CTA that happens via javascript? :thinking_face:

I ended up ditching the CTA and using a regular link. I could modify after HubSpot does its thing but that clashes with our effort to reduce unnecessary javascript. It’s frustrating that this isn’t baked in as an option for content creators like it is elsewhere in the platform and that we’ll no longer have some of the CTA functionality we wanted here.  This was a fun experiment either way. I appreciate your help!

Hi all,
I wanted to report that the new feature "copy_as_hubl" in developerMode ignores the max-width of the section container and treats it as a default section even if I set a different width from the section setting
and ignore the vertical alignment too
How do I dictate which chatbot to show? I tried iframing the whole url I found with dev tools, but it didnt seem to work.
Hi all, is it possible to set orderBy=name[text field]? {% set query_param = "limit=999&orderBy=name" %} in my case it's not working. Does anyone know how to do this?
